Comm. & Schumacher:Jaulan 63 and PEF Apr. 1889, 78); [[מְבוֹא הַסּוּסִים]] ´[[ד]] 2Ki 11:16; sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. Ge 35:19 (E), Ge 38:14 (J) Ge 48:7 (P; rd. [[אפרתה]] Ol); [[הַמֶּלֶח נֵלֵח]] ´[[ד]] † Nu 20:17, Nu 21:22 (both JE; Ar. drb 0lslt.0n of diff. highroads, cf. Seetzen:i. 61, 132, ii. 336 Rob:BR iii. 141 Di; = [[מְסִלָּה]] Nu 20:19) i.e. the highway, used by king with his army; cf. ‖[[בַּדֶּרֶח בַּדֶּרֶח]] De 2:27 i.e. straight (or steadily) along the way; in particular of path, way, in which God moves † [[בַּיׇּם דַּרְכֶָּךָ]] Ps 77:20 (‖[[וּשְׁבִילְיךָ֠]] [[בְּמַיִם רַבִּים]]); [[וּבִשְׂעָרָה דַּרְכּוֹ]] Na 1:3; cf. [[בַּמִּדְבָּר פַּנּוּ]] ´[[י]] ´[[ד]] Is 40:8 (‖[[יַשְּׁרוּ בָּֽעֲרָבָה מְסִלָּה לאלהינו]]); also Mal 3:1, comp. Is 43:16, Is 43:19 (way made by ´[[י]]) & Is 51:10; path of lighting Job 28:26, Job 38:25; of light Job 38:19, Job 38:24, of camel ([[בִּכְרָה]]) Je 2:23, of locusts Joe 2:7 (pl.); v. further the four wonderful things Pr 30:19 the way of an eagle in the air, the way of a serpent upon a rock, the way of a ship in the heart of the sea, and the way of a man with a maid (i.e. no trace is left in any case); cf. also v:Pr 30:20 [[כֵּן דֶּרֶךְ אִשָּׁה מְנׇאָָפֶת]]; figure of death [[אָנׁכִי הוֹלֵח הַיּוֹם בְּדֶרֶח כָּל־הָאָרֶץ]] Jos 23:14 I am going to-day in the way of all the earth (D); so also 1Ki 2:2 (cf. Ge 19:31

journey Ge 24:21, Ge 24:40, Ge 24:42, Ge 24:56 (all J) Nu 9:10, Nu 9:13 (P) Jos 9:11, Jos 9:13 (both JE) 1Ki 18:27, 1Ki 19:7 ´[[רַב מִמְּךָ הַדּ]]; ´[[לַעֲשׂוֹת ד]] Ju Jdg 17:8; [[בְּאֵר]] ´[[ד]] [[שָָׁבַע]] Am 8:14 (journey of—to—Beersheba cf. Hi St; but txt. dub., LXX o( qeo/v, cf. Gunning; Hoffm:ZAW 1883, 123 prop. [[דּׂדְךָ]], We [[בְּאֵרְךָ]] cf. Bu:ThLz 1892, 62); [[דֶּרֶךְ חׂל]] 1Sa 21:6 a common (not sacred) journery; esp. c. temp. modif. [[שְׁלשֶׁת יׇמִים]] ´[[ד]] Ge 30:36 (J) Ex 3:18, Ex 5:3, Ex 8:23, Nu 10:33, Nu 10:33 (all JE), Nu 33:8 (P) cf. also Ge 31:23 (E) Nu 11:31, Nu 11:31 (JE), 1Ki 19:4, 2Ki 3:9; go one's way [[הָלַח לְדַרְכּוֹ]] † Ge 19:2 (J), Ge 32:2 (E), Ge 33:16 (J), Nu 24:25, Jos 2:16 (both JE), Ju Jdg 18:26, Jdg 19:27, 1Sa 1:18, 1Sa 26:25, 1Sa 30:2, 1Ki 1:49, Je 28:11, vid. [[הלך]]; also ´[[הָפַח לְד]] † 1Sa 25:12, & (fig.) ´[[פָּנׇה לְד]] † Is 53:6 (so Is 56:11
infr.); of [[זוֹנׇה]], fig. of Israel, [[וַתְּפַזְּרִי אֶת־דְּרָכַיִח לַזׇּרִים]] Je 3:13.

of direction, almost or quite = toward, 1Ki 8:44, 1Ki 8:48 = 2Ch 6:34, 2Ch 6:38 pray toward the city, etc.; 1Ki 18:43 look toward the sea; esp. in Ezek. of looking, going, etc. [[חָפוֹנׇה]] ´[[ד]] Ez Eze 8:5, Eze 8:5 cf. Eze 21:2, Eze 40:6; cstr. [[הַקָּדִים]] ´[[ד]] Ez Eze 40:10 (del. LXX Hi Co) v:Eze 40:22, Eze 43:1; [[הַצָּפוֹן]] ´[[ד]] v:Eze 43:20 cf. [[הַדָּרוֹם]] ´[[ד]] v:Eze 43:24, v:Eze 43:24, [[הַיׇּם]] ´[[ד]] Eze 41:12, [[הֶחָחֵר]] ´[[ד]] Eze 42:7 etc. (c. 28 t. Ez); (v. also [[מִדֶּרֶח]] Ez Eze 9:2 cf. Eze 43:2, Eze 44:3; on [[אַמָּה אֶחָת]] ´[[ד]] Ez Eze 42:4 v. VB Co Da) cf. [[לאׁ־יִפְנֶה דֶּרֶךְ כְּרָמִים]] Job 24:18. †

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: usage [[כָּל־הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[ד]] Ge 19:31 (J; cf. also Jos 23:14, 1Ki 2:2 supr.)

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[מִחְרַיִם]] ´[[ד]] Am 4:10 the manner of Egypt, i.e. as was done in Egypt; Is 10:24, Is 10:26.

fig. of course of life, or action, undertakings, etc. [[לאׁ תַחְלִיחַ אֶת־דְּרָכֶיךָ]] De 28:29 cf. Jos 1:8 (D) 1Sa 18:14, 2Sa 22:33 = Ps 18:33; Job 3:23, Job 8:19, Job 17:9, Job 22:28, Job 24:23, Job 31:4, Job 34:21, Ps 10:5, Ps 35:6, Ps 37:5, Ps 37:7, Ps 37:23, Ps 91:11, Ps 102:24, Ps 119:37, Ps 128:1, Ps 139:3, Ps 146:9, Pr 2:8, Pr 3:6, Pr 3:23, Pr 11:5, Pr 20:24, Pr 29:27, Pr 31:3; Is 40:27, Is 45:13, Is 48:15, Is 55:8, Is 55:9, Je 2:36, Je 10:23, Je 12:1, Je 23:12, La 3:9, La 3:11, Ho 2:8, Ho 9:8, Ho 10:13, Am 2:7 ([[עְנׇוִים]] ´[[ד]]); thrice (Ch) in summary of a king's life, of Abijah [[וּדְרָכָיו וּדְבָרָיו]] 2Ch 13:22; of Jotham [[וְכָל־מִלְחֲמׂתָיו וּדְרָכָיו]] 2Ch 27:7; of Ahaz [[וְכָל־דְּרָכָיו הָרִאשׁׂנִים וְהָאַחֲרוֹנִים]] 2Ch 28:26; [[אׂרְחׂתֶיךָ]] ´[[ד]] Is 3:12 cf. also Is 30:11 and Is 57:18; = gain Is 56:11, pleasure, etc. Is 58:13. †

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: supr.; esp. cstr. before names of good kings 1Ki 22:43, 2Ki 22:2, 2Ch 11:17, 2Ch 20:32, 2Ch 21:12, 2Ch 21:12 (pl.) so 2Ch 34:2; cf. [[דַּרְכֵי דָּוִיד הָרִאשׁׂנִים]] 2Ch 17:3 the first ways of David; also [[דַּרְכֵי עַמִּי]] Je 12:16. †

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: supr.; [[לָתֵת דַּרְכּוֹ בְּראׁשׁוֹ]] 1Ki 8:32 to place his way upon his head, i.e. requite it on him = 2Ch 6:23, cf. Ez Eze 7:4, Eze 9:10, Eze 11:21, Eze 16:43, Eze 22:31; [[פְּרִי דַּרְכָּם]] Pr 1:31; esp. cstr. before names of bad kings [[תׇרָבְעָם]] ´[[ד]] 1Ki 15:34 (cf. v:1Ki 15:26) 1Ki 16:2, 1Ki 16:19, 1Ki 16:26, 1Ki 22:53 cf. v:1Ki 22:53, v:1Ki 22:53; also [[מַלְכֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל]] ´[[ד]] 2Ki 8:18, 2Ki 16:3, 2Ch 21:6, 2Ch 21:13, 2Ch 28:2 (pl.); [[דַּרְכֵי בֵּית אַחְאָב]] 2Ki 8:27 = 2Ch 22:3 (of Ahaziah, grandson of Ahab); [[הָעָם הַזֶּה]] ´[[ד]] Is 8:11, [[הַגּוֹיִם]] ´[[ד]] Je 10:2, ´[[ד]] [[אֲבוֹתֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 20:30 cf. 2Ki 21:21. †
